name: Stage Fright
description: Stage Fright is a single player rhythm and horror game where you take the role of a piano prodigy who is overwhelmed by musical performance anxiety. This anxiety manifests itself as a supernatural ghost girl, the mysterious HANNAH, who haunts your concerts to strain your ability and sanity.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5 2nd Gen 2410M (2.30 GHz) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 525M Storage: 1 GB available space
